name: Sweet Fighter
description:
Press any key to start and watch the amazing cutscene.

White Ryu: A = LEFT, D = RIGHT, W = JUMP, LEFT SHIFT = HEARTDOUKEN

Blue Ryu: Use arrows (up to jump), RIGHT SHIFT = HEARTDOUKEN

Please enjoy this game wholeheartedly <3


CREDITS

Made with Construct 3

Also used Kritaand Piskel

Sounds:

  • Freesound Piano by justabeat
  • Freesound Cello bass by justkiddink

And a bit of editing with Audacity

Visuals: 

  • Ryu Sprites from Spriters Resource
  • Fonts from Hyperpix (title) and Arcade Font Writer
